definition: to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: The skip bombs were fused at fifteen seconds there was no room for error.
sentences.chinese: 跳彈的引信只有15秒，沒有任何出錯的餘地。

sentences.english: The dynamite and the fuses are strapped along sticks of bamboo before being shoved into pre-drilled holes.
sentences.chinese: 炸彈和引信綁在長竹竿上，放入事先磚好的洞裏。

sentences.english: The whole ballistic electromagnetic environment is very important for the design of fuzes, especially for that of electrical fuzes.
sentences.chinese: 全彈道電磁環境對引信特別是電引信的設計非常重要。

sentences.english: The whole ballistic electromagnetic environment is very important for the design of fuzes, especially for that of electrical fuzes.
sentences.chinese: 全彈道電磁環境對引信特別是電引信的設計非常重要。

sentences.english: This program is suited for the fault tree analysis of fuze.
sentences.chinese: 該程序在引信故障樹分析中起一定的指導作用。

sentences.english: In order to analyse the fault tree of fuze, We must follow certain methods.
sentences.chinese: 對引信故障樹進行分析時，應以一定的方式逐步進行。

sentences.english: Finally, it suggests how to develop new ship-to-air missile fuse for our navy.
sentences.chinese: 對我國發展艦空導彈引信提出了建議。

sentences.english: Conformal microstrip antenna is known as a key technique in radio fuze system.
sentences.chinese: 共形微帶天線是無線電引信中的一項關鍵技術。

sentences.english: Results The basic idea of intelligent design was presented in fuzes .
sentences.chinese: 結果提出了引信智能化設計的基本思想。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the technology of frequency agility and FM fixed-distance in the field of radio fuze.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了無線電引信中的頻率捷變調頻定距技術。

sentences.english: Its Shan Leiti and blasting fuse two major part compositions.
sentences.chinese: 它山雷體和引信兩大部分組成。

sentences.english: The demodulation technique of PRCPM fuze signal is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了僞碼調相引信信號的解調技術。

sentences.english: This paper discusses a method of the optimum-design of the cylindrical helical compression springs used in fuzes.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了引信用圓柱螺旋壓縮彈簧的優化設計方法。

sentences.english: Claymores are now fired with a clacker, and can be set up in certain areas to form traps or ambushes.
sentences.chinese: 闊劍地雷現在使用引信引爆，可以放在某處埋伏敵軍。

sentences.english: There was the little coil of pale hair which had been used as the fuze to this great explosion.
sentences.chinese: 裏面有一綹淡淡地毛髮，它就是這場大爆炸的引信。

sentences.english: Here you can see where the fuze well was removed and then re-attached.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏你可以看到很好的引信被刪除，然後重新連接。
